name: AsyncEspOTA
description: An Asynchronous Over the Air Update library for esp32 Arduino microControllers expanding on the work of RomeHein

name: BFC
description: A data logging hardware solution for motorcycle enthusiasts

name: ADL
description: A data logging hardware solution encompanssing multiple automotive industries

name: ESPecial
description: This project aim to provide an easy way to control your esp32. You no longer need programming skills to set complex tasks. This can be a very nice approach for small projects, home automation and/or educational purposes.

name: ESPInstaller
description: A simple webserver to allow easy installation of other project directly from their repo
